text:
By the way,
I was thinking of thanking P-tan.

Thank... for what?
Did I do something?

The outfits... and also,
you helped with the unit's concept, right?

Oh... that's right. But I'm just happy
to see everyone coming together as a unit.
So, it's not really something to thank me for.

Still, this time...
No, I can't refuse it!

P-tan,
Thank you for everything you've done for us.

Haha... Well, you're welcome.
But it's thanks to Yuika and everyone too.

Oh, so gratitude comes back around here?
Then... Thank you for adjusting this lesson next time!

N-No, if that's the case,
then I should be thanking you...
